rdp_activity.description: Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP) Activity events report remote client connections to a server as seen on the network.

ntp_activity.caption: NTP Activity
ntp_activity.name: ntp_activity
ntp_activity.description: The Network Time Protocol (NTP) Activity events report instances of remote clients synchronizing their clocks with an NTP server, as observed on the network.

ftp_activity.caption: FTP Activity
ftp_activity.name: ftp_activity
ftp_activity.description: File Transfer Protocol (FTP) Activity events report file transfers between a server and a client as seen on the network.

http_activity.caption: HTTP Activity
http_activity.name: http_activity
http_activity.description: HTTP Activity events report HTTP connection and traffic information.

dns_activity.caption: DNS Activity
dns_activity.name: dns_activity
dns_activity.description: DNS Activity events report DNS queries and answers as seen on the network.

email_file_activity.caption: Email File Activity
email_file_activity.name: email_file_activity
email_file_activity.description: Email File Activity events report files within emails.

dhcp_activity.caption: DHCP Activity
dhcp_activity.name: dhcp_activity
dhcp_activity.description: DHCP Activity events report MAC to IP assignment via DHCP from a client or server.

email_url_activity.caption: Email URL Activity
email_url_activity.name: email_url_activity
email_url_activity.description: Email URL Activity events report URLs within an email.

network_activity.caption: Network Activity
network_activity.name: network_activity
network_activity.description: Network Activity events report network connection and traffic activity.

ssh_activity.caption: SSH Activity
ssh_activity.name: ssh_activity
ssh_activity.description: SSH Activity events report remote client connections to a server using the Secure Shell (SSH) Protocol.

smb_activity.caption: SMB Activity
smb_activity.name: smb_activity
smb_activity.description: Server Message Block (SMB) Protocol Activity events report client/server connections sharing resources within the network.

remediation.name: remediation
remediation.caption: Remediation
remediation.description: Remediation events report the results of remediation commands targeting files, processes, and other objects.

remediation_activity.caption: Remediation Activity
remediation_activity.name: remediation_activity
remediation_activity.description: Remediation Activity events report on attempts at remediating a compromised device or computer network. It follows the MITRE countermeasures defined by the D3FEND™ Matrix.

file_remediation_activity.caption: File Remediation Activity
file_remediation_activity.name: file_remediation_activity
file_remediation_activity.description: File Remediation Activity events report on attempts at remediating files. It follows the MITRE countermeasures defined by the D3FEND™ Matrix. Sub-techniques will include File, such as File Removal or Restore File.

network_remediation_activity.caption: Network Remediation Activity
network_remediation_activity.name: network_remediation_activity
network_remediation_activity.description: Network Remediation Activity events report on attempts at remediating computer networks. It follows the MITRE countermeasures defined by the D3FEND™ Matrix. Techniques and Sub-techniques will include Network, such as Network Isolation or Network Traffic Filtering.

process_remediation_activity.caption: Process Remediation Activity
process_remediation_activity.name: process_remediation_activity
process_remediation_activity.description: Process Remediation Activity events report on attempts at remediating processes. It follows the MITRE countermeasures defined by the D3FEND™ Matrix. Sub-techniques will include Process, such as Process Termination or Kernel-based Process Isolation.

unmanned_systems.name: unmanned_systems
unmanned_systems.caption: Unmanned Systems
unmanned_systems.description: Unmanned Systems events report the activity, existence, and/or state of unmanned systems for tracking, mission planning, and other related activities.

drone_flights_activity.caption: Drone Flights Activity
drone_flights_activity.name: drone_flights_activity
drone_flights_activity.description: Drone Flights Activity events report the activity of Unmanned Aerial Systems (UAS), their Operators, and mission-planning and authorization metadata as reported by the UAS platforms themselves, by Counter-UAS (CUAS) systems, or other remote monitoring or sensing infrastructure. Based on the Remote ID defined in Standard Specification for Remote ID and Tracking (ASTM Designation: F3411-22a) ASTM F3411-22a

airborne_broadcast_activity.caption: Airborne Broadcast Activity
airborne_broadcast_activity.name: airborne_broadcast_activity
airborne_broadcast_activity.description: Airborne Broadcast Activity events report the activity of any aircraft or unmanned system as reported and tracked by Automatic Dependent Surveillance - Broadcast (ADS-B) receivers. Based on the ADS-B standards described in Code of Federal Regulations (CFR) Title 14 Chapter I Subchapter F Part 91 and in other general Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) supplemental orders and guidance described here.
